desc: Students focus on writing scientific papers, preparing scientific posters, and giving presentations in the context of a specific, year-long, interdisciplinary research project. In addition, this weekly seminar series builds collaborative research skills such as working in teams, performing reviews of statistical literature, consulting effectively, and communicating proficiently. Exposure post-graduate opportunities in statistics is also provided. Open to seniors accepted into the Center for Interdisciplinary Research.
name: Statistical Research
